attributes.action: help all small businss by keeping the fuel duty low and help keep my small companyrunning. each month my company fuels cost are getting higher and higher and M&S Ambulane service are struggling to work as the costs go up
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we ask this Goverment to reduce the current fuel duty and help the country get back on its feet, this is not helped by a 2% decrease in vat we need 20pence off the cost 

gorden if you want your job next year listen to your poeple or yu will watch there foot steps go to the other lot
